scripts.build:lib:all: npm run build:lib:core && npm run build:lib:console:base && npm run build:lib:md-menu:base && npm run build:lib:ng-bootstrap:base && npm run build:lib:ngx-bootstrap:base
scripts.build:lib:core: ng build ngx-ui-tour-core --configuration production && cpx projects/ngx-ui-tour-core/CHANGELOG.md dist/ngx-ui-tour-core/
scripts.build:lib:console: npm run build:lib:core && npm run build:lib:console:base
scripts.build:lib:console:base: ng build ngx-ui-tour-console --configuration production && cpx projects/ngx-ui-tour-console/CHANGELOG.md dist/ngx-ui-tour-console/
scripts.build:lib:md-menu: npm run build:lib:core && npm run build:lib:md-menu:base
scripts.build:lib:md-menu:base: ng build ngx-ui-tour-md-menu --configuration production && cpx projects/ngx-ui-tour-md-menu/CHANGELOG.md dist/ngx-ui-tour-md-menu/
scripts.build:lib:ng-bootstrap: npm run build:lib:core && npm run build:lib:ng-bootstrap:base
scripts.build:lib:ng-bootstrap:base: ng build ngx-ui-tour-ng-bootstrap --configuration production && cpx projects/ngx-ui-tour-ng-bootstrap/CHANGELOG.md dist/ngx-ui-tour-ng-bootstrap/
scripts.build:lib:ngx-bootstrap: npm run build:lib:core && npm run build:lib:ngx-bootstrap:base
scripts.build:lib:ngx-bootstrap:base: ng build ngx-ui-tour-ngx-bootstrap --configuration production && cpx projects/ngx-ui-tour-ngx-bootstrap/CHANGELOG.md dist/ngx-ui-tour-ngx-bootstrap/
scripts.pub: npm run pub:lib && npm run pub:demo
scripts.pub:lib: npm run build:lib:all && (npm run pub:lib:core & npm run pub:lib:console & npm run pub:lib:ng-bootstrap & npm run pub:lib:md-menu & npm run pub:lib:ngx-bootstrap)
